thread.section_title: Ski.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ski.com | www.ski.com | 2 of 44
thread.title: Joan

author: Joan
title: Joan
text: I called Mimi at Ski.com to try to plan a few days skiing at Deer Valley, as part of a Spring Break college tour trip. Mimi got right back to me and even though I wanted ski in /ski out and 2 beds and was trying to not spend a fortune, she found just the right place and less than 48 hrs later, everything (room, lifts, equipment, car and she would have done my flight, except I already had my flights) was organized and booked and done. Yay Mimi !
